items.title: Underground Coring Operations
items.desc: Execution of specialized upward coring for water drainage and pressure relief in underground strata.

items.title: Precision Machinery Setup
items.desc: Deployment of specialized drilling rigs in confined underground galleries for strata control.

items.title: High-Pressure Water Management
items.desc: Successful tapping of underground water pockets to ensure safe working conditions in the mine.

items.title: Heavy Civil Foundation
items.desc: Reinforced steel cage preparation for deep pile foundations of industrial structures.

items.title: Structural Raft Reinforcement
items.desc: Large-scale rebar grid layout for a heavy-duty industrial floor raft, ensuring maximum load-bearing capacity.

items.title: Advanced Formwork Systems
items.desc: Installation of heavy-duty shuttering and formwork for concrete retaining walls and channels.

items.title: Site Development & Trenching
items.desc: JCB deploying for trench excavation and site leveling in challenging soil conditions.

items.title: Raft Reinforcement
items.desc: Erection of vertical steel reinforcement for structural raft in a multi-level facility.

items.desc: Expert technicians performing precision rebar tying and layout for foundation beams.
